name: World of Pets: Match 3 and Decorate
name_original: World of Pets: Match 3 and Decorate
description:
Everyone's favorite match 3 puzzle will never let you get bored! Go in search of pets who have escaped from the shelter, help them find a new home and find friends. An interesting journey full of adventures and unexpected encounters awaits you.

Game features:
- Addictive gameplay - make combinations "three in a row"
- Unique pets that you will unlock as you progress through the story
- Customize your new pet house with original decorations
- Complete daily tasks and get bonuses and valuable gifts
- Can be played without internet connection
- Works great even on weak devices
